comment:
* Parameters that specify what kind of bugreport should be taken.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: BUGREPORT_MODE_FULL
variables.comment:
* Options for a bugreport without user interference (and hence causing less
     * interference to the system), but includes all sections.

variables.name: BUGREPORT_MODE_INTERACTIVE
variables.comment:
* Options that allow user to monitor progress and enter additional data; might not
     * include all sections.

variables.name: BUGREPORT_MODE_REMOTE
variables.comment:
* Options for a bugreport requested remotely by administrator of the Device Owner app,
     * not the device's user.

variables.name: BUGREPORT_MODE_WEAR
variables.comment: * Options for a bugreport on a wearable device.

variables.name: BUGREPORT_MODE_TELEPHONY
variables.comment:
* Options for a lightweight version of bugreport that only includes a few, urgent
     * sections used to report telephony bugs.

variables.name: BUGREPORT_MODE_WIFI
variables.comment:
* Options for a lightweight bugreport that only includes a few sections related to
     * Wifi.

variables.name: BUGREPORT_MODE_ONBOARDING
variables.comment: * Options for a lightweight bugreport intended to be taken for onboarding-related flows.

variables.name: BUGREPORT_MODE_MAX_VALUE
variables.comment:
* The maximum value of supported bugreport mode.
     * @hide

variables.name: BUGREPORT_FLAG_USE_PREDUMPED_UI_DATA
variables.comment:
* Flag for reusing pre-dumped UI data. The pre-dump and bugreport request calls must be
     * performed by the same UID, otherwise the flag is ignored.

variables.name: BUGREPORT_FLAG_DEFER_CONSENT
variables.comment:
* Flag for deferring user consent. * *

This flag should be used in cases where it may not be possible for the user to respond * to a consent dialog immediately, such as when the user is driving. The generated bugreport * may be retrieved at a later time using {@link BugreportManager#retrieveBugreport( * String, ParcelFileDescriptor, Executor, BugreportManager.BugreportCallback)}.

variables.name: BUGREPORT_FLAG_KEEP_BUGREPORT_ON_RETRIEVAL
variables.comment:
* Flag for keeping a bugreport stored even after it has been retrieved via * {@link BugreportManager#retrieveBugreport}. * *

This flag can only be used when {@link #BUGREPORT_FLAG_DEFER_CONSENT} is set. * The bugreport may be retrieved multiple times using * {@link BugreportManager#retrieveBugreport( * String, ParcelFileDescriptor, Executor, BugreportManager.BugreportCallback)}.

methods.name: public int getMode()
methods.comment: * Returns the mode of the bugreport to request.

methods.name: public int getFlags()
methods.comment: * Returns the flags to customize the bugreport request.
